CmdLine: yum -y install gcc gcc-c++ make openssl-devel pcre-devel pcre-devel &&     cd /resource && tar -zxf nginx-1.14.2.tar.gz &&     groupadd www &&     useradd  -g www -M -s /sbin/nologin www &&     cd nginx-1.14.2 &&     ./configure --prefix=/usr/local/nginx     --with-http_ssl_module     --with-http_stub_status_module     --with-http_gzip_static_module &&     make -j 4 && make install &&     rm -rf /usr/local/nginx/html/* &&     echo "ok">>/usr/local/nginx/html/index.html &&     mkdir -p /usr/local/nginx/conf/vhost &&     cd / && rm -rf nginx-1.14.2* &&     cp -rf /resource/nginx.conf /usr/local/nginx/conf &&     cp -rf /resource/proxy_java.conf /usr/local/nginx/conf &&     cp -rf /resource/localhost.conf /usr/local/nginx/conf/vhost &&     rm -rf /resource &&     cd / &&     ln -sf /usr/share/zoneinfo/Asia/Shanghai /etc/localtime
Commands.Name: run
